house_listing.house_description: $3000 allowance for carpet and paint, great floor plan, big cathedral ceiling in family room, skylight, wet bar, open kitchen, lots of cabinets. Master bedroom with walk-in closet, jetted tub & shower, deck access from master and den, new roof, skylights & h.W.H
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Contemporary Style, Garage Door Opener, Ranch Style, Skylights,Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
